name: Rotator Avoid
description:
Now be ready for a new 3D touch enabled rotator game for your iPhone,iPod and iPad.
Rotating a ball is what you get with Rotator Avoid! You need to keep your ballot alive by rotating it in a circle, avoiding to collide with red balls. Rotate your ball with a single tap & swipe up/down to increase/decrease its speed. Or force touch to speed up your dot else you'll have a fatal collision with other balls!
As time goes by, the game's difficulty increases with increasing number of balls and it will be an even bigger challenge to get the new high-score.
How long can you survive? Let's find out!
Download Now to enjoy most addictive 3D touch enabled game on your iPhone,iPod and iPad.
